channel.title: chrome on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words
channel.description: Recent content in chrome on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words

item.title: Window managers for Google Chrome
item.description: A list of extensions to manage position of chrome tabs / windows and to create splits. Descriptions are original texts from extension pages. Tabs Outliner Next Generation Session/Windows/Tabs Manager and Too_Many_Open_Tabs Solution That Really Works. Ultimate overview for all of your open, and not so open (read further), browser windows and tabs, in a resizable vertical side view, with a Tree Style Tab feature. A KILLER FEATURE – Has the unique ability to close and preserve “in place” any tab or window, without removing them from the original context in the tree.
